title: Impact
content: Impact: Users shared that the app made preventing death from a fall or cardiac arrest through immediate assistance seem like something that could really help reduce mortality.
quote: A quote from peer comments: 'LIVEHELP app helps you feel more confident when hiking in the mountains, as well as track your personal health in an easy and engaging way'.

title: What I learned
content: I learned that even though the problem I was trying to solve was a big one, diligently going through each step of the design process and aligning with specific user needs helped me come up with solutions that were both feasible and useful.
